Title: Requires braille labeling in dwellings in public housing projects in the state
Summary: Requires all dwellings in projects located within the state to include braille labeling on all room numbers, elevator buttons, and directional signage in common areas in such dwellings.
LawCode: Add ยง223-c, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requiring braille labeling in dwellings in public housing projects in the state
